name: ClicBoxPrototype
description:
Object of the game

  • Keep the main box within the play space

Controls

  • Click any mouse button to apply an upward force to the main box

This prototype was created for a monthly challenge on the Game Design with Reilly youtube channel, in which a game in Construct must be made with only two objects. 

For my two objects I used a sprite object and the mouse input object

Known Bugs

At high speeds you can sometime 'break through' the layout view, thus restarting the game. 

You can check out Reilly's channel here:
